rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0001
rows.name: Since there was no response, I was prepared for it, but[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0002
rows.name:
This damage... looks like they fought something.
These aren't claw marks  of native creatures.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0003
rows.name: And the team members are nowhere to be found[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0004
rows.name:
Did they run off somewhere on foot,
or were they taken?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_JNK0010
rows.name: Optimistic

rows.label: xs03030100_SEL0011
rows.name: Suggest searching nearby.

rows.label: xs03030100_JNK0020
rows.name: Pessimistic

rows.label: xs03030100_SEL0021
rows.name: Look down and pray for the team members' souls.

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0005
rows.name:
Right. Let's explore the area.
We might find the team members.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0006
rows.name:
With that kind of attitude,
you won't survive on this planet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0007
rows.name: If you give up now, it's all over.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0007_2
rows.name: First, let's explore the area.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0008
rows.name: Wait a second, Elma-san![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0009
rows.name:
An Earth-spec IFF transmission is coming from that direction[ST:wide ]―
It's a Pathfinder response![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0010
rows.name: Over there[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0011
rows.name: Clearly artificial[ST:wide ]― right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0012
rows.name: This structure[ST:wide ]― it's like a fortress.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0013
rows.name:
Look at this.
Life signs different from ours[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0014
rows.name:
Looks like unidentified life forms are active inside.
Elma-san, the way they're moving[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_JNK0030
rows.name: Certainty

rows.label: xs03030100_SEL0031
rows.name: Suggest they're intelligent life forms.

rows.label: xs03030100_JNK0040
rows.name: Guess

rows.label: xs03030100_SEL0041
rows.name: Convey that they are just native creatures.

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0015
rows.name: That's right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0016
rows.name: That's wrong.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0017
rows.name:
They are taking orderly group action.
They are clearly intelligent life forms.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0018
rows.name: Are these the native inhabitants of this planet?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0019
rows.name:
Or are they alien visitors like us?
I don't know, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0020
rows.name: Could they be the species that dragged Earth into the war?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0021
rows.name:
Space is vast, beyond anything Earthlings
can imagine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0022
rows.name: We can't rule out any possibility yet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0023
rows.name: Should we request backup from NLA?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0024
rows.name:
There's a chance we could be intercepted.
We maintain comms blackout here and rescue the team members.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0025
rows.name: YOU LOT, WHAT ARE YOU DOING![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0026
rows.name: Huh?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0027
rows.name:
Careless.
I focused too much on the front![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0028
rows.name:
EARTHLINGS?
WHY ARE YOU HERE?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0029
rows.name:
They know Earthlings...
That means[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_JNK0050
rows.name: Stand Down

rows.label: xs03030100_SEL0051
rows.name: Lower guard and talk.

rows.label: xs03030100_JNK0060
rows.name: Grip Weapon

rows.label: xs03030100_SEL0061
rows.name: Take a fighting stance.

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0030
rows.name: What are you doing?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0031
rows.name: That's fine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0031_2
rows.name:
Lin, stand down.
Looks like they understand our language somehow.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0032
rows.name: Does that mean[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0033
rows.name: It means there's room left for negotiation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0034
rows.name: I see.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0035
rows.name: DON'T![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0036
rows.name:
I told you when we first met,
don't be needlessly aggressive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0037
rows.name: Fortunately, the opponents understands Earth's language.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0038
rows.name:
Meaning[ST:wide ]―
there's still room left for negotiation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0039
rows.name: You're right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0040
rows.name: We want to negotiate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0040_2
rows.name:
If you have prisoners, we want them released.
If there are conditions for their release, we'll hear them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0041
rows.name: If you don't, we'll leave.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0042
rows.name:
KILL ALL EARTHLINGS.
THOSE ARE OUR ORDERS![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03030100_MSG0043
rows.name: THAT'S RIGHT. NOT ONE WILL ESCAPE.[ST:wait ]
